attributes.action: Stop Julien Blanc and Real Social Dynamics from entering the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Julien Blanc and his company Real Social Dynamics are "pick-up artists" who plan to come to the UK to hold seminars suggesting methods that sexually abuse women physically and emotionally. This is not acceptable. Please follow Australia's example in cancelling his visa and the visas of any employees of RSD involved in the seminars so they can not cause any potential harm to the women of the UK.

The BBC and other UK newspapers have covered the campaign to #TakeDownJulienBlanc. For more information please see these articles:

BBC: http://m.bbc.com/news/blogs-trending-29936769

The Guardian: http://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2014/nov/05/julien-blanc-the-female-attraction-expert-glorifies-sexual-violence-the-less-seminars-he-holds-the-better
